block.jolcraft.hearth.cooldown: You must rest before light a hearth.
block.jolcraft.hearth.need_coal: You need coal to light this.
tooltip.jolcraft.quill_empty: Can be filled with ink sacs or by right-clicking a squid.
tooltip.jolcraft.quill: Used for writing on paper. Can be filled by right-clicking a squid.
tooltip.jolcraft.written_contract: Given to dwarves without professions to get signed contracts. Signed contracts are used to buy profession contracts from a guildmaster. If given to a dwarf with a profession they will create a contract for their profession.
tooltip.jolcraft.signed_contract: Signed contracts are used to buy profession contracts from a guildmaster.
tooltip.jolcraft.profession_contract: Profession contracts can be given to dwarves without professions to set their profession.
tooltip.jolcraft.guild_sigil: Can be bought from a master dwarf without a profession.
tooltip.jolcraft.legendary_page: Salvaged from ancient tomes by historians. Can be used to restore ancient legendary tomes by certain dwarven professions.
tooltip.jolcraft.trim_material: Can be used to trim armor.
tooltip.jolcraft.strongbox: Strongboxes are chests that can generate with locks that needs to be picked. Breaking a locked strongbox also breaks the lock but removes any ungenerated loot. Breaking a strongbox with silk touch retains all of its contents.
tooltip.jolcraft.coin_pouch: Stores up to 999 coins. Right-click when held to deposit all coins in inventory. Left-click with coins in inventory to deposit up to a stack. Right-click in inventory to withdraw up to a stack.
tooltip.jolcraft.hearth: Can be activated if placed within 10 blocks of a claimed bed. Need to sleep in a bed to activate a hearth again. Multiple players can be bound to a hearth. Provides Homestead effect to bound players within range.
tooltip.jolcraft.verdant: JolCraft crops ignores growing conditions and also grow faster on this. Other crops can be planted but no extra effects.
tooltip.jolcraft.hops_seed: Needs two blocks height and a light level of 8 or less to grow.
tooltip.jolcraft.deepslate_bulbs: Needs a light level of 8 or less to grow. Can only be planted on Deepslate, Tuff or Verdant Soil.
tooltip.jolcraft.mushroom: Planted and spreads like vanilla mushrooms. No giant variant.
tooltip.jolcraft.festerling: Can be cultivated with rotten flesh. Planted on top of log ends. Spreads like vanilla mushrooms
tooltip.jolcraft.malt: Can be used on a water cauldron as a first step in brewing.
tooltip.jolcraft.hops: Can be used on a cauldron with malt to add effects to a brew.
tooltip.jolcraft.yeast: Can be used on a fermenting cauldron with malt/hops to start the brewing process. Created by using sugar on a water cauldron and extracted using glass bottles.
tooltip.jolcraft.glass_mug: Can be used to extract a finished dwarven brew from a cauldron.
tooltip.jolcraft.spanner: Can be used to produce scrap from salvage. Hold the spanner in one hand and salvage in the other, then right click!
tooltip.jolcraft.geode: Can be broken into dust using an artisan hammer at a lapidary bench.
tooltip.jolcraft.uncut_gem: Can be broken into dust using an artisan hammer or cut using a chisel at a lapidary bench.
tooltip.jolcraft.artisan_hammer: Can be used to break geodes and gems at a lapidary bench.
tooltip.jolcraft.cut_gem: Can be used to trim armor for bonus stats. Cosmetic trims do not override given stats. Only new stat trims.
tooltip.jolcraft.chisel: Can be used to cut gems at a lapidary bench.
tooltip.jolcraft.chisel.cut_locked: You have not learned how to cut gems!
tooltip.jolcraft.need_lang: You need to understand dwarvish to use this.
tooltip.jolcraft.need_ancient: You need to understand ancient dwarvish to use this.
tooltip.jolcraft.ancient_memory: Ancient memory effect gives you temporary understanding of ancient dwarvish.
tooltip.jolcraft.bounty: Give this to a merchant to get a bounty crate.
tooltip.jolcraft.bounty_crate: Needs to be filled and handed in for a reward. Right-click when held to fill from inventory. Left-click in inventory with required item to fill or right-click to insert single item. Right-click in inventory to extract items.
tooltip.jolcraft.language.locked: You do not understand each other.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarf.not_paid: You should pay the dwarf first.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarf.cannot_promote: This dwarf cannot accept a new contract.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarven_lexicon.locked: The pages are filled with unfamiliar symbols.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarven_lexicon.unlocke: The key to dwarven speech lies within.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarven_lexicon.shift: Can be used to learn dwarvish. Found in mineshafts or stronghold libraries. Can be bought from master librarians.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarven_lexicon.use: You have learned to understand the dwarven language!
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarven_lexicon.knows: You already understand the dwarven language.
tooltip.jolcraft.ancient_dwarven_lexicon: The pages are filled with unfamiliar symbols.
What was once silent may now speak again.
Can be used to learn ancient dwarvish. Found in ancient dwarven ruins.
You have learned to understand the ancient dwarven language!
You have no idea how to decipher this.
The text is clearly dwarvish, but you cannot decipher its secrets.
You already understand the ancient dwarven language.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarven_tome.shift: Can be sold to Dwarven Historians.
tooltip.jolcraft.ancient_dwarven_tome.un: An unidentified dwarven tome, written in ancient dwarvish.
tooltip.jolcraft.ancient_dwarven_tome.pa: You recognize the language as Dwarvish, but cannot understand it.
tooltip.jolcraft.legendary_ancient_dwarv: Can be used to gain permanent knowledge.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarven_tome.identify_s: You identify the contents of the tome.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarven_tome.identify_f: You cannot make sense of the dwarven runes.
tooltip.jolcraft.dwarven_tome.locked: The pages are filled with unfamiliar symbols.
tooltip.jolcraft.tome_unlock.empty: This tome lacks knowledge that you find useful.
tooltip.jolcraft.tome_unlock.brew: You can now brew using multiple hops!
tooltip.jolcraft.tome_unlock.gems: You can now cut gems using a chisel!
tooltip.jolcraft.lapidary_bench.locked_c: You have no idea how to cut this gem without breaking it.
tooltip.jolcraft.paper.locked: The paper is marked with unfamiliar symbols.
tooltip.jolcraft.lockpick: Used to pick locks. Will break on failure. Lockpicking is easier when using potions.
tooltip.jolcraft.strongbox.busy: Someone else is trying to pick this lock.
tooltip.jolcraft.bounty.locked: The parchment is marked with unfamiliar symbols.
tooltip.jolcraft.bounty_crate.locked: The crate is marked with unfamiliar symbols.
tooltip.jolcraft.bounty_crate.no_items: You don't have any items to fill the crate.
tooltip.jolcraft.bounty_crate.not_comple: This bounty has not been completed.
tooltip.jolcraft.crate.cooldown: You must wait before you can use another crate.
tooltip.jolcraft.restock_crate: Can be used to restock the inventory of a trader.
tooltip.jolcraft.reroll_crate: Can be used to reroll the inventory of a trader.
tooltip.jolcraft.reroll_crate.fail: This trader inventory cannot be rerolled!
tooltip.jolcraft.salvage: Can be used to produce scrap using a spanner. Hold the spanner in one hand and the salvage in the other, then right click!
tooltip.jolcraft.reputation.locked: You need a higher reputation for this.
tooltip.jolcraft.reputation.max_tier: You are already at the highest reputation tier!
tooltip.jolcraft.reputation.not_enough_e: You need %1$d endorsements to advance (you have %2$d).
tooltip.jolcraft.reputation.never_endors: This dwarf does not give endorsements.
tooltip.jolcraft.reputation.cannot_endor: This dwarf is not ready to give you an endorsement.
tooltip.jolcraft.reputation.wrong_tablet: You must present the correct reputation tablet.
tooltip.jolcraft.reputation.level_up: You have advanced in dwarven reputation!
tooltip.jolcraft.tablet.locked: The stone is marked with unfamiliar symbols.
tooltip.jolcraft.tablet.endorsements_inf: To gain endorsements, give your reputation tablet to a master-level dwarf with a profession. Endorsements are unique per profession and can only be gained once.
tooltip.jolcraft.tablet.advance_info: To advance in reputation level you need endorsements from dwarves with professions. When you have enough, hand over your tablet to a guildmaster to update it.
tooltip.jolcraft.tablet: To advance in reputation level you need endorsements from dwarves that have professions. There are three professions per reputation level. When you have enough endorsements hand over your tablet to a guildmaster and he will update it. To gain endorsements you give your reputation tablet to a dwarf with a profession and master level. Endorsements are unique per profession and can only be gained once.
tooltip.jolcraft.brewing.hops: You already added this hops type to the brew.
tooltip.jolcraft.brewing.locked_hops: Adding more hops without proper knowledge would ruin the brew.
advancement.jolcraft.root.title: The Dwarven Path
advancement.jolcraft.read_lexicon.title: Bilingual
advancement.jolcraft.read_lexicon.descri: Learn to understand the dwarven language.
advancement.jolcraft.trade_dummy.title: What now?
advancement.jolcraft.trade_dummy.descrip: You are a stranger to most dwarves. You need to earn their trust.
advancement.jolcraft.historian.endorse.d: Get endorsed by a master historian.
advancement.jolcraft.merchant.endorse.de: Get endorsed by a master merchant.
advancement.jolcraft.scrapper.endorse.de: Get endorsed by a master scrapper.
advancement.jolcraft.rep1_dummy.title: New Faces
advancement.jolcraft.rep1_dummy.descript: More dwarves are now willing to interact with you.
Get endorsed by a master brewmaster.
advancement.jolcraft.guard.trade.title: Shield and Service
advancement.jolcraft.guard.endorse.title: Writ of Protection
advancement.jolcraft.guard.endorse.descr: Get endorsed by a master guard.
advancement.jolcraft.keeper.trade.title: Horns and Harvest
advancement.jolcraft.keeper.endorse.desc: Get endorsed by a master keeper.
advancement.jolcraft.rep2_dummy.title: Gaining Ground
advancement.jolcraft.rep2_dummy.descript: Your deeds echo through the halls. More dwarves are willing to work with you.
